text: is a Japanese actor. He is known for his roles in The Funeral and Farewell to the Ark. Yamazaki also played Nenbutsu no Tetsu on the television series Hissatsu Shiokinin and Shin Hissatsu Shiokinin. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese stage actors
title: Tsutomu Yamazaki
